resources.string: Automatically capitalize the 1st char of a sentence in alphabet mode.
Display predicted words for correcting typing error.
Display predicted words as conversion candidates.
Remove all words from learning dictionary.
Remove all words from user dictionary.
List/add/edit/delete words in English user dictionary.
List/add/edit/delete words in Japanese user dictionary.
List/add/edit/delete words in Chinese user dictionary.

string.name: tip_en_end_of_tutorial
string.b: This is the end of the tutorial.

string.name: tip_en_to_open_keyboard
string.b: The keyboard opens any time you touch a text field.

string.name: tip_to_step1
string.b: Like a normal mobile keyboard, tapping ○ three times will result\nin *C*.

string.name: tip_to_step2_a
string.b: For example, let\'s type \"hi.\"\n- Tap ○ twice to get \"h\"

string.name: tip_to_step2_b
string.b: \n- Tap → to advance to the right

string.name: tip_to_step2_d
string.b: \n- Use touch or ↓ to set the word.

string.name: tip_to_step3_a
string.b: The ■ key switches between Japanese, English, and number input.

string.name: tip_to_step3_b
string.b: We\'ve switched from English to numbers. Next is Japanese.

string.name: tip_to_step4
string.b: For other input modes (like full width)\nor a PC style keyboard, hold ■\nfor 3 seconds to show the input menu.

string.name: tip_to_step5
string.b: When you\'re done typing, hit the \"back\" key (←) to close the keyboard.

string.name: tip_to_step6
string.b: This is the end of the tutorial.

resources.string: Try typing and using the keyboard yourself!
Try it on the button below.
Registered words in English User Dic
Registered words in Japanese User Dic
Registered words in Chinese User Dic
